Application Developer Documentation and Tools

Version 8.1.0

Select your preferred tool for client application integration

Powerful & Easy RBroker Framework

The RBroker Framework is the simplest way to integrate R Analytics into any Java, JavaScript or .NET application. Submit as many R tasks as your application needs. No need to manage client-side request queues or block for results. Let this framework handle all of the complexity while you enjoy effortless scale. More...

Comprehensive Client Libraries

If the RBroker Framework doesn't give you exactly what you need then you can get access to the full DeployR API using our client libraries. We currently provide native client library support for Java, JavaScript or .NET developers. More...

API Reference Guide

Need to integrate DeployR-powered R Analytics using a different programming language? The API Reference guide details everything you need to know to get up and running. Also described is the API Explorer used to interactively learn the DeployR API. More...

Learn about DeployR tools, examples & integrations

Repository Manager

This web-based tool serves as a bridge between the data scientist's scripts, models, & data and the deployment of that work into the DeployR repository to enable application developers to create DeployR-powered client applications and integrations. More...

RBroker Framework & Client Library Examples

Learn more about the RBroker Framework and Client Libraries through our examples. You can find some basic examples under the examples directories on GitHub. Also, look on GitHub for additional applications. More...

After DeployR has been installed, contact your administrator for your username, password, and the DeployR server IP. Using that IP, you can access your DeployR landing page (http://< server-IP >:8100/deployr/landing), from which you can access tools like the Repository Manager and the Event Console.
